name: blueprint-design-tokens
description: A repo for storing and generating the tokens used in the BluePrint design system.
author: Braxton Coats

scripts.transform-light: npx token-transformer tokens/figmaTokens tokens/output/light.json reference,system,BluePrint reference --expandTypography
scripts.transform-dark: npx token-transformer tokens/figmaTokens tokens/output/dark.json reference,systemDark,BluePrint reference --expandTypography
scripts.transform: npm run transform-light && npm run transform-dark
scripts.build-tokens: cd tokens && node buildTokens.js && cd ../../ && mv tokens/output/scss/light.scss ./scss/_theme.scss && mv tokens/output/scss/dark.scss ./scss/_themeDark.scss
scripts.build-all: npm run transform && npm run build-tokens
